 Promotion for senior pre-paid subscribers 1. Eligibility: Pre-paid subscribers (excluding PFC subscribers) who activated before 1st December, 2012 . For new subscribers, promotional top-ups of this promotion will be considered as those in the first 6 promotional top-up Check eligibility at [Tra cứu danh sách KM] 2. Content: Bonus 50% of the top-up value in the on-net credit (KM1) during the promotion period. Unlimited amount of top-ups . If the period of this promotion is as same as Golden Day promotion, subscribers will receive benefits from both. 3. Regulations: Apply to the subscribers in the messaging list only. Call to customers to inform about the promotion. Message about this promotion will not be sent to the subscribers who declined to receive promotion messages. 4. Time : From 10th to 11th December, 2103/12/2013 &#24544;&#35802;&#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; 1.&#23545;&#35937;&#65306; &#20110; FC&#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143;&#38500;&#22806;&#65289;&#12290;&#27491;&#22312;&#20139;&#21463;&#21069;6&#27425;&#20805;&#20540;&#20248;&#24800;&#30340;&#21495;&#30721;-&#35745;&#20837;&#19968;&#27425;&#20805;&#20540;
